name: farmstart
description: FarmStart - A comprehensive farm management application

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm start
scripts.build:parallel: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm start"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
